channel.title: Junction on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Junction on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-50 East at NV-722
item.description: US-50 East at NV-722 West to Gold Venture, Ione, and Reese River.

item.title: US-50 East at NV-722 West
item.description: US-50 East at NV-722 West in Lander County

item.title: US-89 North at ID-36
item.description: US-89 North at ID-36. Merge right to continue north on US-89 towards Montpelier and Jackson (Wyoming). Use ID-36 West for Preston.

item.title: UT-30 West at US-89
item.description: UT-30 west at US-89. Use US-89 north for Montpelier (ID), and Jackson (WY). Use US-89 south for Logan.

item.title: UT-30 West Approaching UT-16
item.description: UT-30 west approaching UT-16. Use UT-16 south for Randolph, Woodruff, and Evanston (Wyoming).

item.title: UT-30 West Approaching UT-16
item.description: UT-30 west approaching UT-16. Use UT-30 west for Laketown, Garden City, and Logan.

item.title: UT-30 West - Sage Creek Junction
item.description: UT-30 west at Sage Creek Junction. This is the name for the UT-30/UT-16 junction.

item.title: WY-89 North at US-30
item.description: WY-89 north at US-30. Use US-30 east for Kemmerer and Fossil Butte National Monument. Use US-30 West/WY-89 North for Cokeville. WY-89 North joins US-30 West to Border Junction.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching WY-89
item.description: US-30 west approaching WY-89.

item.title: US-30 West/US-189 North at US-189/US-30 Split
item.description: US-30 West/US-189 North at US-189/US-30 split in Kemmerer. Use US-189 North for Big Piney; use US-30 West for Sage Junction and Fossil Butte National Monument.

item.title: End WY-414 North at I-80/WY-412
item.description: End WY-414 North at I-80/WY-414. Use I-80 West for Evanston; I-80 East for Green River. Continue north for WY-412.

item.title: US-50 West/CA-89 South at US-50/CA-89 Split
item.description: US-50 West/CA-89 south at US-50/CA-89 split roundabout.

item.title: US-50 West/CA-89 South Approaching CA-89
item.description: US-50 west/CA-89 south approaching CA-89/US-50 split.

item.title: US-50 West Approaching I-580/US-395
item.description: US-50 west approaching I-580/US-395. Use I-580/US-395 north for Reno. US-50 west joins I-580/US-395 south for Minden and South Lake Tahoe (CA). Continue on William St. for Downtown Carson City.

item.title: US-91 North at US-89/UT-13
item.description: US-91 north at US-89/UT-13. Use US-89 south for Perry. US-89 joins US-91 north to Logan.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-189 East at I-80 West
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-189 east at I-80 West/US-189 South (Exit 3) onramp to Salt Lake (Utah). Continue east on the business loop (Harrison Drive) for Evanston.

item.title: I-80 West Offramp at WY-372
item.description: I-80 west Exit 83 offramp at WY-372/La Barge Road.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 West at WY-530
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-30 west at WY-530. Use WY-530 south for the Flaming Gorge National Recreation Area. Continue on BL-80/Bus. US-30 west for I-80/US-30 and Salt Lake (Utah).

item.title: US-30 East/US-189 South at Split
item.description: US-30 East/US-189 South at US-30 By-Pass and US-30 ramps. Use US-189 South/US-30 East for Evanston. Turn right for the US-30 By-Pass West onramp for Port of Entry and Cokeville.

item.title: US-30 East/US-189 South - Diamondville
item.description: US-30 East/US-189 south in Diamondville. Turn right to continue on US-30 East/US-189 South. Use US-30 East/US-189 south for Evanston and Rock Springs.

item.title: US-189 South at US-30
item.description: US-189 South at US-30 in Kemmerer. Turn right for US-30 west to Sage Junction and Port of Entry. Turn left for US-30 East/US-189 south to Diamondville. US-30 east joins US-189 south through Kemmerer and Diamondville.

item.title: US-189 South approaching US-30
item.description: US-189 south approaching US-30 in Kemmerer.

item.title: ID-55 North at ID-78
item.description: ID-55 north at ID-78 junction to Grandview and Bruneau. Continue north on ID-55 to Nampa and Boise. Milepost 2.

item.title: ID-55 North - Givens Hot Springs
item.description: ID-55 north approaching ID-78 junction in Marsing. Use ID-78 south for Givens (Hot) Springs.

item.title: US-50 West at Alt. US-50 West
item.description: US-50 west at Alt. US-50 west. Use US-50 west for Carson (City). Continue ahead for Alt. US-50 west to Reno.

item.title: US-50 West - Leeteville Junction
item.description: US-50 west approaching Leeteville Junction of US-50 and Alt. US-50.

item.title: US-50 West at NV-839
item.description: US-50 west at NV-839 south to Rawhide.

item.title: CA-62 West Approaching I-10
item.description: Approaching I-10 on CA-62 west.

item.title: End CA-247 South at CA-62
item.description: End CA-247 south at CA-62. Use CA-62 east for 29 Palms; use CA-62 east for I-10 and Morongo Valley.

item.title: CA-247 South at CA-18
item.description: CA-247 south at CA-18. This is not the true junction with CA-18, which lies a little to the south and east. Use CA-18 west for Victorville; use CA-18 east for Big Bear Lake; use CA-247 south for 29 Palms.

item.title: End AZ-66 West At I-40/US-93
item.description: End AZ-66 west at I-40/US-93 jct. Use I-40 West/US-93 North for Los Angeles and Las Vegas. Use I-40 East/US-93 South for Phoenix and Flagstaff. Continue straight for Andy Devine Avenue and Historic Loop US-66.

item.title: I-40 West at AZ-66
item.description: I-40 west at AZ-66 (and Historic Loop US-66) at Exit 53 onramp. Use AZ-66 east for Peach Springs and Kingman Airport.

item.title: I-40 West - AZ-68 Traffic Use Exit 48
item.description: AZ-68 traffic for Bullhead City, and Laughlin (Nevada), use Exit 48. This sign is posted on the east end of Kingman approaching Exit 53.

item.title: US-93 North at I-40
item.description: US-93 north at I-40. Use I-40 West/US-93 north for Kingman/Los Angeles/Las Vegas. Use I-40 east for Flagstaff. US-93 north joins I-40 west through Kingman.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching I-40
item.description: US-93 north approaching I-40, one-half mile.

item.title: US-93 North at AZ-97 North
item.description: US-93 north at AZ-97 north. Use AZ-97 north for Bagdad and Hillside.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching AZ-97
item.description: US-93 north approaching AZ-97.

item.title: US-93 North at AZ-71
item.description: US-93 north at AZ-71 to Los Angeles and Prescott. Continue north on US-93 for Kingman.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching AZ-71
item.description: US-93 north approaching AZ-71.

item.title: US-93 North at AZ-89 North
item.description: US-93 north at AZ-89 north. Use AZ-89 for Congress and Prescott. Continue north on US-93 for Kingman.

item.title: US-93 North at AZ-89 North
item.description: US-93 north at AZ-89 north.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching AZ-89 North
item.description: US-93 north approaching AZ-89 north. Use AZ-89 north for Congress and Prescott. Continue north on US-93 for Kingman.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching AZ-89
item.description: US-93 north approaching AZ-89 north.

item.title: US-93 North - Tegner St. Roundabout
item.description: US-93 north at the Tegner St. roundabout. US-93 used to follow Tegner St. into downtown Wickenburg, until the bypass was completed in 2009.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching Tegner St.
item.description: US-93 north approaching Tegner St. roundabout. Continue north on US-93 for Kingman and Las Vegas.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching US-93
item.description: US-60 west approaching US-93, (To) AZ-89.

item.title: US-60 West - Thomas Road at 27th Ave.
item.description: US-60 west (Thomas Road) at 27th Ave. Turn right on 27th Ave. to continue on US-60 west.

item.title: I-17 North - Exit 201 Offramp at US-60
item.description: I-17 North - Exit 201 offramp at US-60. Turn left for US-60/To Grand Ave.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at US-70
item.description: US-60 west/AZ-77 south at US-70. Turn left for US-70 and to continue south on AZ-77. Turn right to continue west on US-60.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South Approaching US-70
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South approaching US-70. Use US-60 west for Globe and Phoenix. Use US-70 west/AZ-77 south for Tucson (via AZ-77) and Safford (via US-70). This is the western end of US-70.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South Approaching US-70
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 south approaching US-70. This is the western end of US-70.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-73
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-73 east to Fort Apache, White River, and Fort Apache National Historic Park. Continue west on US-60 for Globe.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South Approaching AZ-73
item.description: US-60 west/AZ-77 south approaching AZ-73.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West at AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-260 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260. Turn right to continue on AZ-260. Continue straight for US-60 West/AZ-77 South.

item.title: US-60/AZ-77/AZ-260 West at AZ-260
item.description: US-60/AZ-77/AZ-260 west at AZ-260 west to Overgaard and Fool Hollow Lake Recreation Area. US-60 West/AZ-77 South continues to AZ-73 Jct. AZ-260 west leaves US-60/AZ-77 here.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West at AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West at AZ-260. Use AZ-260 west for Heber and Payson. Continue on US-60 West/AZ-77 South for Globe.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260. Turn left for AZ-260 west; continue straight for US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South at AZ-260. Use AZ-260 west for Pinetop/Lakeside. AZ-260 joins US-60 West/AZ-77 South through Show Low. Use US-60 West/AZ-77 South/AZ-260 West for Payson and Globe.

item.title: US-60 West/AZ-77 South Approaching AZ-260
item.description: US-60 West/AZ-77 South approaching AZ-260 in Show Low.

item.title: US-60 West at AZ-77
item.description: US-60 west at AZ-77. Turn right for AZ-77 north. Continue straight for US-60 west and AZ-77 south. AZ-77 joins US-60 west to Globe.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching AZ-77
item.description: US-60 west approaching AZ-77. Use AZ-77 north for Holbrook. Continue west on US-60 and AZ-77 south for Show Low.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching AZ-77
item.description: US-60 west approaching AZ-77.

item.title: AZ-61 West Approaching US-60
item.description: AZ-61 west approaching US-60.

item.title: End AZ-180A East at AZ-61
item.description: End AZ-180A East at AZ-61. Use AZ-61 west for Show Low; use AZ-61 east for St. Johns.

item.title: AZ-61 West At AZ-180A West
item.description: AZ-61 west at AZ-180A west. Use AZ-180A for Holbrook and Petrified Forest. Continue west on AZ-61 for Show Low.

item.title: AZ-61 West Approaching AZ-180A
item.description: AZ-61 west approaching AZ-180A.

item.title: US-180 West/AZ-61 West at Split
item.description: US-180 West/AZ-61 West at US-180/AZ-61 split. Turn right for US-180 west to Holbrook and Petrified Forest (National Park). Continue straight on AZ-61 west for Show Low.

item.title: US-180 West/AZ-61 West Approaching AZ-61
item.description: US-180 West/AZ-61 West approaching US-180/AZ-61 split.

item.title: US-191 South/AZ-61 West at US-180
item.description: US-191 South/AZ-61 West at US-180. Turn left for US-180 East/US-181 South to Springerville.

item.title: US-191 South/AZ-61 West Approaching US-180
item.description: US-191 South/AZ-61 West approaching US-180.

item.title: AZ-61 West at US-191
item.description: AZ-61 west at US-191. AZ-61 west joins US-191 south to St. Johns. Use US-191 South/AZ-61 West for St. Johns. Use US-191 North for Sanders.

item.title: AZ-61 West Approaching US-191
item.description: AZ-61 west approaching US-191. AZ-61 west joins US-191 south to St. Johns.

item.title: NM-53 West - Black Rock Jct.
item.description: NM-53 at Black Rock jct. Turn right for Black Rock. Continue west on NM-53 for Zuni.

item.title: End NM-602 South at NM-53
item.description: End NM-602 South at NM-53. Use NM-53 west for Zuni; NM-53 east for Ramah.

item.title: End NM-602 South At NM-53
item.description: End NM-602 South at NM-53. Use NM-53 west for Zuni; use NM-53 east for Ramah and Fence Lake.

item.title: NM-602 South Approaching NM-53
item.description: NM-602 south approaching NM-53.

item.title: NM-602 South at Zuni-4
item.description: NM-602 south at Zuni-4 south. At the time of this photograph, Zuni-4 was closed for bridge repair, so the guide sign was turned upside town. During normal times, use Zuni-4 south for Zuni and St. John. Continue south on NM-602 for Ramah and Grants.

item.title: NM-602 South at Jones Ranch Road
item.description: NM-602 south at Jones Ranch Road jct. to Jones Ranch and Chichiltah.

item.title: NM-602 South Approaching NM-564
item.description: NM-602 south approaching NM-564. Turn right to continue south on NM-602. NM-564 is the eastern belt route around Gallup.

item.title: NM-118 West at NM-602/US-491
item.description: NM-118 west at Arnold St., to NM-602/Zuni/Ramah and US-491/Shiprock.

item.title: I-40 East Exit 26 offramp at NM-118
item.description: I-40 east Exit 26 offramp at NM-118/BL-40. NM-118 is the route of former US-66.

item.title: I-40 East Offramp at BL-40/NM-118
item.description: I-40 east offramp at BL-40/NM-118. Use NM-118 east for Army Depot. Rehoboth, and and Red Rock Park.

item.title: I-40 East at Exit 26 Offramp
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 26 Offramp. Turn right for State Police; turn left for Gallup and Hospital.

item.title: NM-118 East at I-40 East Onramp
item.description: NM-118 east at I-40 east onramp, at Exit 16. Use I-40 east for Albuquerque.

item.title: BL-40/NM-118 West at I-40 West
item.description: BL-40/NM-118 west at I-40 west to Flagstaff. This is the western end of the Gallup business loop.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 16
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 16 - BL-40/NM-118/West Gallup.

item.title: I-40 Onramp at Exit 346
item.description: I-40 onramp at Exit 346. Use I-40 west for Flagstaff; use I-40 east for Albuquerque.

item.title: BL-40 East/AZ-77 North at I-40
item.description: BL-40 East/AZ-77 North at I-40 freeway entrance. Use I-40 west for Flagstaff; use I-40 east for Albuquerque. AZ-77 joins I-40 east through Holbrook.

item.title: BL-40 East/AZ-77 North Approaching I-40
item.description: BL-40 East/AZ-77 North approaching I-40. AZ-77 joins I-40 east through Holbrook.

item.title: AZ-77 North/BL-40 East Approaching I-40
item.description: AZ-77 North/BL-40 East approaching I-40. AZ-77 north joins I-40 east to the east side of Holbrook.

item.title: US-180 West/AZ-77 North at BL-40
item.description: US-180 West/AZ-77 North at BL-40. Continue straight for BL-40 East/AZ-77 North (Navajo Blvd.). Turn left for BL-40 West/US-180 West (Hopi Drive).

item.title: AZ-77 North/US-180 West at BL-40
item.description: AZ-77 North/US-180 West at BL-40 in downtown Holbrook. Continue straight on Navajo Blvd. for AZ-77 North/BL-40 East. Turn left on Hopi Drive for US-180 West/BL-40 west.

item.title: AZ-77 North/US-180 West Approaching BL-40
item.description: AZ-77 north/US-180 west approaching BL-40 in Holbrook.

item.title: South Apache Dr. at AZ-77 and US-180
item.description: S. Apache Dr. at AZ-77 and US-180. Use AZ-77 south for Snowflake; use AZ-77 north/US-180 west for Holbrook; use US-180 east for Petrified Forest.

item.title: AZ-77 North at US-180
item.description: AZ-77 north at US-180. Use US-180 east for St. Johns; use US-180 west/AZ-77 north for Holbrook.

item.title: AZ-77 North Approaching US-180
item.description: AZ-77 North approaching US-180. US-180 joins AZ-77 into Holbrook.

item.title: AZ-377 North Approaching AZ-77
item.description: AZ-377 north approaching AZ-77.

item.title: AZ-277 North at AZ-377
item.description: AZ-277 north at AZ-377. Use AZ-277 for Snowflake; use AZ-377 for Holbrook.

item.title: AZ-277 East Approaching AZ-377
item.description: AZ-277 east approaching AZ-377 north.

item.title: AZ-260 West at AZ-277
item.description: AZ-260 west at AZ-277. Use AZ-277 north for Snowflake and Holbrook. Continue west on AZ-260 for Heber.

item.title: AZ-260 West at AZ-277 North
item.description: AZ-260 east at AZ-277 north to Snowflake and Holbrook. Continue east on AZ-260 for Show Low.

item.title: AZ-260 East Approaching AZ-277
item.description: AZ-260 east approaching AZ-277.

item.title: AZ-87 North at AZ-260
item.description: AZ-87 north at AZ-260. Turn right for AZ-260 east for Show Low and Holbrook. Continue straight for AZ-260 west/AZ-87 north for Cottonwood (via AZ-260) and Winslow (via AZ-87). AZ-260 west joins AZ-87 north to the top of the Mogollon Rim.

item.title: AZ-87 North Approaching AZ-260
item.description: AZ-87 north approaching AZ-260. Use AZ-260 east for Holbrook and Show Low.

item.title: AZ-87 North Approaching AZ-260
item.description: AZ-87 north approaching AZ-260 at Milemarker 252.

item.title: AZ-188 Jct. Leaving Mazatzal Rest Area
item.description: AZ-188 junction leaving Mazatzal Rest Area. Turn right for AZ-188 South to Roosevelt. Turn left for AZ-188 North for AZ-87, Phoenix, and Payson.

item.title: AZ-87 North at AZ-188
item.description: AZ-87 north at AZ-188 South.

item.title: AZ-87 North at AZ-188
item.description: AZ-87 north at AZ-188. Use AZ-188 for Roosevelt and Globe. Continue north on AZ-87 for Payson.

item.title: AZ-87 North Approaching AZ-188
item.description: AZ-87 north approaching AZ-188.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop East at AZ-87
item.description: AZ-202 Loop East, Exit 13 offramp, at AZ-87. Use AZ-87 north for Fountain Hills and Payson.

item.title: Scottsdale Road South at AZ-202 Loop
item.description: Scottsdale Road south at AZ-202 Loop.

item.title: N. 24th St. at AZ-202 Loop East
item.description: N. 24th St. at AZ-202 Loop East onramp.

item.title: ID-51 North At Old US-30
item.description: ID-51 north at Old US-30. The Mountain Home business loop used to follow Old US-30 east to I-84. The business loop has been re-routed to follow ID-51 to I-84 instead. Turn right on Old US-30 for I-84 east towards Hammett and Twin Falls. Continue on ID-51 north for I-84/BL-84 and Boise.

item.title: End ID-67 East At ID-51
item.description: End ID-67 east at at ID-51. Use ID-51 south for Bruneau. Use ID-51 north for Mountain Home and Boise.

item.title: End ID-167 East at ID-67
item.description: End ID-167 east at ID-67. Use ID-67 west for the Airbase (Mountain Home AFB). Use ID-67 east for Mountain Home.

item.title: ID-167 East at Mountain Home AFB Grand View Gate
item.description: ID-167 east at Mountain Home AFB, Grand View Gate.

item.title: ID-78 East at ID-45
item.description: ID-78 east to Murphy at ID-45 north to Nampa.

item.title: End ID-45 South at ID-78
item.description: End ID-45 south at ID-78. Use ID-78 west for Marsing. Use ID-78 east for Murphy, the Owyhee County Seat.

item.title: End ID-45 South at ID-78
item.description: End ID-45 south at ID-78. Use ID-78 south for Murphy and Grand View. Use ID-78 north for Marsing.

item.title: BL-84 West at ID-45
item.description: BL-84 West (11th Ave. South) at ID-45. Turn right on 2nd St. South to continue west on BL-84 towards Caldwell and Marsing. Continue ahead on 11th Ave. South for ID-45 south towards Murphy.

item.title: Begin BL-84 West at I-84 Exit 38 Onramp
item.description: Begin BL-84 West (Garrity Blvd.) at I-84/US-30/ID-55 onramp at Exit 38. Use I-84/US-30 East/ID-55 north for Boise. Continue on BL-84 west for Nampa and Murphy.

item.title: I-84/US-30 - Philippi Canyon
item.description: I-84/US-30 at Exit 123 interchange. Turn right for Phillipi Canyon. The Columbia River is in the background.

item.title: I-84/US-30 Onramps at Exit 123
item.description: I-84/US-30 onramps at Exit 123 - Phillipi Canyon. Use I-84/US-30 west for The Dalles; I-84/US-30 east for Arlington.

item.title: 2nd St. North at I-84 West
item.description: 2nd St. North at I-84 West to Portland, at Exit 63 onramp.

item.title: Richmond Parkway East at I-80
item.description: Richmond Parkway East at I-80. Turn right for the I-80 West HOV lanes. Continue ahead for I-80 east towards Sacramento.

item.title: 4th St. East at US-101 South
item.description: 4th St. east at US-101 South to San Francisco and Oakland. This is the Exit 452 onramp.

item.title: Sir Frances Drake Blvd. East at CA-1
item.description: Sir Frances Drake Blvd. east at CA-1. Use CA-1 north for Petaluma. Use CA-1 south for San Rafael and San Francisco.

item.title: CA-1 South in Point Reyes Station
item.description: CA-1 south in Point Reyes Station. Turn left on A St. to continue south on CA-1 for San Francisco.

item.title: CA-37 West Approaching CA-121
item.description: CA-37 west to San Rafael approaching CA-121 north to Sonoma and the Infineon Raceway.

item.title: CA-36 East at CA-99
item.description: CA-36 East at CA-99. Turn left to continue east on CA-36. Continue straight ahead for CA-99.

item.title: CA-36 East at CA-99
item.description: CA-36 east at CA-99. Use CA-36 east for Lassen National Park and Susanville. Continue south on CA-99 for Chico.

item.title: CA-36 East at CA-99
item.description: CA-36 east approaching CA-99. Turn left at junction (CA-36) for Lassen National Park and Susanville.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-62
item.description: US-97 south at OR-62 to Fort Klamath and Crater Lake.

item.title: US-97 North - Silver Lake Road
item.description: US-97 north at Silver Lake Road. Use Silver Lake Road for Klamath Marsh National Wildlife Refuge HQ and Silver Lake.

item.title: End US-97 South at I-5
item.description: End US-97 South at I-5 south onramp (Exit 747). Turn left for I-5 south to Redding. Turn left for the College of the Siskiyous.

item.title: US-97 South at Weed Blvd.
item.description: US-97 south at Weed Blvd. Use Weed Blvd. north (BL-5/CA-265) for I-5 to Yreka. Use Weed Blvd. south (BL-5/US-97) to continue on US-97 and for I-5 south to Redding.

item.title: US-97 South at CA-161
item.description: US-97 south at CA-161 east to Tulelake. Tulelake is 23 miles east of here.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching CA-161
item.description: US-97 south approaching CA-161 east to Tulelake. CA-161 parallels the Oregon-California border east across the Klamath Basin.

item.title: UT-13 South Approaching UT-82
item.description: UT-13 south approaching UT-82. Use UT-82 south for Garland and Tremonton. Use UT-13 south for Salt Lake.

item.title: UT-30 West Approaching UT-13
item.description: UT-30 west approaching UT-13. Use UT-13 south for Tremonton and Garland. Use UT-13 north for Pocatello (Idaho).

item.title: UT-30 West Approaching UT-13
item.description: UT-30 west approaching UT-13. Use UT-13 south for the Golden Spike National Historic Site.

item.title: UT-30 West Approaching UT-81 North
item.description: UT-30 west approaching UT-81 north. Use UT-81 north for Fielding. Continue west on UT-30 for Tremonton.

item.title: UT-30 West Approaching UT-38
item.description: UT-30 west approaching UT-38. Use UT-38 south for Brigham City. Continue west on UT-30 for Tremonton.

item.title: US-89 South at US-91
item.description: US-89 south at US-91. Use US-91 north for Smithfield. Use US-91 south/US-89 south for Salt Lake, Brigham City, and Tremonton. US-89 joins US-91 south to Brigham City.

item.title: US-89 South Approaching UT-243
item.description: US-89 south approaching UT-243 towards Beaver Mountain Ski Area. Beaver Mountain Ski Area is located in the Wasatch Range just east of Logan, Utah.

item.title: UT-30 West at US-89
item.description: UT-30 west at US-89. Use US-89 north for Montpelier (ID), and Jackson (WY). Use US-89 south for Logan.

item.title: UT-30 West at UT-16 South
item.description: UT-30 west at UT-16 south. Use UT-16 south for Evanston (WY), Ogden, and Salt Lake. It is faster to go through Wyoming to reach the Salt Lake City area from this part of Utah, then to go around Bear Lake and through Logan.

item.title: UT-30 West Approaching UT-16
item.description: UT-30 west approaching UT-16. Use UT-16 south for Randolph and Woodruff.

item.title: UT-30 West Approaching UT-16
item.description: UT-30 west approaching UT-16. Use UT-30 west for Laketown, Garden City, and Logan.

item.title: UT-30 West - Sage Creek Junction
item.description: UT-30 west at Sage Creek Junction. This is the name for the UT-30/UT-16 junction.

item.title: WY-89 North at US-30
item.description: WY-89 north at US-30. Use US-30 east for Kemmerer and Fossil Butte National Monument. Use US-30 West/WY-89 North for Cokeville.

item.title: US-30 West at WY-89
item.description: US-30 west at WY-89. Use WY-89 south for Evanston and Logan, Utah. Use US-30 east/WY-89 north for Cokeville.

item.title: US-30 East at US-189
item.description: US-30 east at US-189 north. Use US-189 north for Big Piney. US-189 joins US-30 through Kemmerer towards Diamondville.

item.title: End US-30 By-Pass West at US-30
item.description: End US-30 By-Pass west at US-30. Use US-30 west for Kemmerer. Use US-30 east for Cokeville. US-30 By-Pass loops around the south side of Kemmerer and Diamondville.

item.title: US-30 East/US-189 South at Split
item.description: US-30 East/US-189 South at US-30 By-Pass and US-30 ramps. Use US-189 South/US-30 East for Evanston. Turn right for the US-30 By-Pass West onramp for Port of Entry and Cokeville.

item.title: US-30 East/US-189 South - Diamondville
item.description: US-30 East/US-189 south in Diamondville. Turn right to continue on US-30 East/US-189 South. Use US-30 East/US-189 south for Evanston and Rock Springs.

item.title: US-189 South at US-30
item.description: US-189 south at US-30. Use US-30 west for Sage Jct. and Port of Entry. Use US-30 East/US-189 South for Diamondville. US-189 joins US-30 east through the Kemmerer/Diamondville area.

item.title: US-189 South Approaching US-30
item.description: US-189 south approaching US-30.

item.title: US-30 West at US-189 North
item.description: US-30 west at US-189 north. Use US-189 north for Big Piney. Continue west on US-30 for Sage Jct. and Fossil Butte National Monument.

item.title: US-30 West at US-189
item.description: US-30 west at US-189. Use US-189 south for Evanston. Use US-189 North/US-30 West for Diamondville and Kemmerer. US-30 exits the freeway here, while US-30 Bypass continues west around the south side of Kemmerer.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching US-189 and US-30 By-Pass
item.description: US-30 west approaching US-189 and US-30 By-Pass. Continue ahead for US-30 By-Pass towards Cokeville, and Pocatello (Idaho). Exit for US-30 West/US-189 for Kemmerer and Diamondville.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching US-189
item.description: US-30 west approaching US-189.

item.title: End WY-235 at US-30
item.description: End WY-235 at US-30. Use US-30 west for Kemmerer; use US-30 east for Green River.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching WY-235
item.description: US-30 west approaching WY-235. Use WY-235 west for Granger. Continue west on US-30 for FMC Granger Mine.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching WY-235
item.description: US-30 west approaching WY-235.

item.title: I-80 West Offramp at WY-372
item.description: I-80 west Exit 83 offramp at WY-372/La Barge Road.

item.title: West End of Green River Business Loop
item.description: BL-80 West/Bus. US-30 West at I-80 onramps (Exit 89). Use I-80/US-30 West for Evanston. Use I-80/US-30 East for Rock Springs.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 West at WY-374
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-30 west at WY-374/Service Road to Jamestown. Continue west on Business Loop for I-80.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at WY-530
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-30 east at WY-530. Use WY-530 south for the Flaming Gorge National Recreation Area. Continue on BL-80/Bus. US-30 east for I-80/US-30 and Rock Springs.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at I-80/US-30 West
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at I-80/US-30 west towards Green River. This is the onramp for Exit 107.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at I-80/US-30
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at I-80/US-30 (Exit 107 onramp). Use I-80/US-30 East for Rawlins. Use I-80/US-30 West for Green River.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at Elk St.
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at Elk St. in downtown Rock Springs. Use Elk St. north for US-191 to Pinedale and I-80. Continue east on BL-80/Bus. US-30 for Rawlins.

item.title: WY-430 North - To I-80
item.description: WY-430 North (New Hampshire St.) at Marchant St. Turn left on Marchant St. to continue on WY-430, and to reach I-80. WY-430 is incorrectly marked as TO here, when in reality this is a continuation of WY-430.

item.title: UT-44 East Approaching US-191
item.description: UT-44 east approaching US-191. Use US-191 north for Flaming Gorge Dam, Dutch John, and Rock Springs (Wyoming).

item.title: UT-43 East Approaching UT-44
item.description: UT-43 east approaching UT-44. Use UT-44 east for Vernal, Dutch John, and Flaming Gorge Dam. Continue east on UT-43 for Green River.

item.title: WY-414 South at WY-410
item.description: WY-414 south at WY-410. Use WY-410 south for Robertson. Continue south on WY-414 for Lonetree.

item.title: WY-414 South Approaching BL-80
item.description: WY-414 south approaching BL-80. Use BL-80 east for Lyman; BL-80 west for Fort Bridger State Historic Site. Continue south on WY-414 for Mountain View.

item.title: I-80 East at Exit 39 Offramp
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 39 Offramp. Use WY-414 South for Mountain View. Use WY-412 North for Carter.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-189 East at I-80 West
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-189 east at I-80 West/US-189 South (Exit 3) onramp to Salt Lake. Continue east on the business loop for Evanston.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 3 Offramp
item.description: I-80 east Exit 3 offramp at BL-80/Bus. US-189. Turn left for the business loop into Evanston.

item.title: BL-80 West at Alt. US-93
item.description: BL-80 west at Alt. US-93. Use Alt. US-93 South for Ely. Alt. US-93 joins BL-80 west towards I-80 and Elko.

item.title: Alt. US-95 North at Alt. US-50/BL-80/NV-427
item.description: Alt. US-95 north at Alt. US-50/BL-80 east to Fallon and Elko and BL-80/NV-427 west to Reno.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching US-395
item.description: US-50 east approaching US-395. Use US-395 south for Minden and Bishop (California). US-50 east joins US-395 north for Carson City and Reno.

item.title: US-50 East At CA-89 South
item.description: US-50 east at CA-89 south/Markleeville/Jackson to CA-88. CA-89 north joins US-50 east to South Lake Tahoe.

item.title: CA-49 South/CA-89 North at Split
item.description: CA-49 south at CA-89 north split. CA-89 turns left here towards Calpine, Graeagle, Blairsden, and Quincy.

item.title: CA-89 North/CA-49 South at Westside Road
item.description: CA-89 North/CA-49 South at Westside Road to Beckwourth and Portola.

item.title: CA-89 North Approaching CA-49
item.description: CA-89 north at CA-49. Use CA-49 north for Loyalton. Use CA-49 South/CA-89 North for Quincy and Downieville.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching ID-46 South
item.description: US-20 west approaching ID-46 south to Gooding. Continue west on US-20 for Fairfield and Boise.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching ID-75
item.description: US-20 west approaching ID-75 north to Sun Valley, and south to Shoshone. Continue west on US-20 for Boise.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West/US-93 South Jct.
item.description: US-20/US-26 West/US-93 South at split in Carey. Use US-20 west for Sun Valley and Boise. Use US-26 West/US-93 South for Twin Falls.

item.title: US-20/US-26 West at US-93
item.description: US-20/US-26 west at US-93. Use US-93 north for Mackay. Use US-20/US-26 west/US-93 south for Twin Falls and Boise.

item.title: ID-22 West at ID-28
item.description: ID-22 west at ID-28 north to Salmon and south to Idaho Falls.

item.title: ID-22 West at Clark County A1
item.description: ID-22 west at Clark County A1 south to Monteview.

item.title: I-15 Exit 180 Onramp
item.description: I-15 north onramp at Exit 180 to Butte (Montana).

item.title: York Road West at US-91
item.description: York Road west at US-91. This is the former route of US-26, and the former end of US-91 north.

item.title: US-26 West at ID-31
item.description: US-26 west at ID-31 north to Victor and Driggs. Continue west on US-26 for Ririe and Idaho Falls. This is the southern end of the Teton Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-89 North at US-26
item.description: US-89 north at US-26. US-26 continues west to Idaho Falls and Port of Entry. US-89 North/US-26 East join north towards Jackson.

item.title: US-89 North - National Park Info
item.description: US-89 north approaching US-26. Use US-89 north for Yellowstone and Grand Teton National Parks.

item.title: US-89 North Approaching US-26
item.description: US-89 north approaching US-26. US-26 and US-89 join north to Moran Jct. in Grand Teton National Park.

item.title: US-89 North at WY-239
item.description: US-89 north at WY-239 west to Freedom and Soda Springs (Idaho). WY-239 connects with ID-34 at the state line, via Stateline Road.

item.title: US-89 North at WY-238
item.description: US-89 north at WY-238 south to Auburn

item.title: US-89 North at WY-236
item.description: US-89 north at WY-236 west to Fairview

item.title: US-89 North at WY-241 North
item.description: US-89 north at WY-241 north to Osmond

item.title: ID-61 North Approaching US-89
item.description: ID-61 north approaching US-89. Use US-89 north for Afton and Jackson (both in Wyoming). Use US-89 south for Montpelier. This type of direction sign is typically used at freeway ramps.

item.title: US-89 North Approaching ID-61
item.description: US-89 north approaching ID-61 (To WY-89). Use ID-61 south for WY-89, Cokeville, and Kemmerer. Continue north on US-89 for Afton and Jackson. All destinations are in Wyoming. The only instance that I have encountered where state highway shield from another state is posted in Idaho, is at this intersection.

item.title: US-89 North/US-30 West at US-89 North
item.description: US-89 north/US-30 west at US-89 north to Jackson. Continue west on US-30 for Soda Springs and Pocatello.

item.title: US-30/US-89 - Approaching US-89
item.description: US-30 West/US-89 North approaching US-89 north split. Use right lane for US-89 north to Afton and Jackson (both in Wyoming).

item.title: US-89 North at US-30
item.description: US-89 north at US-30 in Montpelier. Use US-30 east for Kemmerer (Wyoming), and US-30 west/US-89 north for Pocatello and Jackson (Wyoming). US-30 and US-89 north join briefly through Montpelier.

item.title: US-89 North at US-30
item.description: US-89 north at US-30 in Montpelier. Use US-30 East for Border and Kemmerer. The left half of this sign is missing.

item.title: End ID-36 East at US-89
item.description: End ID-36 at US-89 Junction. Use US-89 north for Montpelier and Jackson.

item.title: End ID-36 at US-89
item.description: End ID-36 at US-89. Use US-89 south for Paris. US-89 north for Montpelier and Jackson.

item.title: End ID-36 east at US-89
item.description: End ID-36 east at US-89

item.title: ID-34/ID-36 East Approaching Split
item.description: ID-34/ID-36 east approaching ID-34/ID-36 split. Use ID-36 east for Montpelier. Continue on ID-34 east for Grace and Soda Springs.

item.title: ID-34/ID-36 East Approaching ID-36
item.description: ID-34/ID-36 east approaching ID-36 east to Montpelier.

item.title: ID-34 North/ID-36 East - Bear Lake Rec. Area
item.description: ID-34 North/ID-36 East approaching ID-36. Use ID-36 East for the Bear Lake Recreation Area.

item.title: US-91 North/ID-36 East at ID-34/ID-36
item.description: US-91 north/ID-36 east at ID-34/ID-36. Use US-91 north for Pocatello. Use ID-34 North/ID-36 east for Soda Springs and Montepelier.

item.title: US-91 North/ID-36 East Approaching ID-34/ID-36
item.description: US-91 North/ID-36 east approaching ID-34/ID-36 jct. This is the beginning of ID-34 north. The Pioneer Historic Byway leaves US-91 and joins ID-34 north.

item.title: US-91 North at ID-36
item.description: US-91 north at ID-36 west. Use ID-36 west for Dayton. ID-36 east joins US-91 north through Preston. Continue on US-91 North/ID-36 east for Pocatello, Soda Springs, and ID-34 junction.

item.title: US-89/US-91 North at UT-252
item.description: US-89/US-91 North at UT-252 north (10th West) to the Applied Technology College.

item.title: US-91/US-89 North at UT-101
item.description: US-91/US-89 north at UT-101. Use UT-101 west for Wellsville; east for Hyrum.

item.title: US-91 North at US-89/UT-13
item.description: US-91 north at US-89/UT-13. Use US-89 south for Perry. US-89 joins US-91 north to Logan.

item.title: ID-55 North at BL-84
item.description: ID-55 north at BL-84 (Nampa-Caldwell Blvd.). Continue north on ID-55 for I-84.

item.title: ID-55 North at ID-78
item.description: ID-55 north at ID-78 junction to Grand View and Brueau in Marsing.

item.description: ID-55 north approaching ID-78 junction in Marsing.

item.description: US-95 north approaching ID-55.

item.description: Yturri Blvd. at US-95 north to Boise and south to Winnemucca.

item.description: US-95 north at OR-78 west. Merge left for OR-78 to Burns and Crane. Merge right for US-95 to Jordan Valley and Boise.

item.description: US-95 north at OR-78.

item.description: BL-80 West at Exit 9A - Cal Expo.

item.title: US-50 West at CA-49
item.description: US-50 west at CA-49. Use CA-49 north for Auburn; south for Jackson. US-50 through downtown Placerville is a surface street.

item.description: US-50 west at Coloma St. exit.

item.title: US-50 West at Five Mile Road
item.description: US-50 west at the Five Mile Road and Paul Bunyan Road intersection.

item.description: US-50 west at Camino Heights Road interchange.

item.description: US-50 west approaching Carson Road junction

item.description: US-50 West/CA-89 south at US-50/CA-89 split. Use CA-89 south for CA-88/Markleeville/Jackson

item.description: US-50 west/CA-89 south approaching CA-89/US-50 split.

item.description: US-50 south approaching NV-207 east to Kingsbury Grade and Minden.

item.title: US-395 South/US-50 West at US-50 West
item.description: US-395 South/US-50 west at US-50/US-395 split. US-50 turns west towards Lake Tahoe, and Spooner Summit. US-395 continues south to Minden.

item.title: US-50 West Approaching US-395
item.description: US-50 west approaching US-395. Use US-395 north for Reno. US-50 west joins US-395 south for Minden and South Lake Tahoe (CA). Continue on William St. for Downtown Carson City.

item.title: US-50 West Approaching US-395
item.description: US-50 west approaching US-395. Use US-395 north for Reno. US-50 west joins US-395 south for Minden and South Lake Tahoe (CA). Continue on William St. for Downtown Carson City.

item.description: US-50 west approaching NV-341 north to Virginia City. Continue west on US-50 for Carson City.

item.description: US-50 west approaching Six Mile Canyon Road and Fort Churchill Road.

item.description: US-50 west at Alt US-50/Alt US-95 junction in Silver Springs. Use Alt. US-50 East/Alt. US-95 North for Fernley. Use Alt. US-95 South for Yerington. Continue on US-50 west for Carson City.

item.title: US-50 West at Alt. US-50 West
item.description: US-50 west at Alt. US-50 west. Use US-50 west for Carson (City). Continue ahead for Alt. US-50 west to Reno.

item.description: US-50 west approaching Leeteville Junction of US-50 and Alt. US-50.

item.title: US-50 West at US-95 North
item.description: US-50 west at US-95 north to Winnemucca. Continue on US-50 west for Carson City and Reno.

item.description: US-50 west at NV-116 - Stillwater Road and Harmon Road.

item.title: US-50 West at NV-118
item.description: US-50 west at NV-118 - Wildes Road to the Naval Air Station.

item.description: US-50 west approaching Middlegate Junction (NV-361).

item.description: US-50 west at NV-722 west

item.description: US-50 west approaching NV-722 west to Ione, Reese River, Gold Venture, and the Austin Airport.

item.title: US-50 West at NV-376 South
item.description: US-50 west at NV-376 south for Round Mountain and Tonopah. Continue west for Austin and Reno.

item.description: NV-278 south approaching US-50

item.description: Jct. US-50 on NV-278 South

item.title: End NV-278 South at US-50
item.description: End NV-278 south at US-50. Use US-50 west for Carson City. Use US-50 east for Eureka and Ely.

item.title: Wileys Well Road at I-10
item.description: Wileys Well Road at I-10 (Exit 222). Use I-10 west for Indio. Use I-10 east for Blythe.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 222 Offramp
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 222 offramp - Wiley’s Well. Turn south for Wiley’s Well Road, north for Rest Area.

item.title: Neighbors Blvd. South at I-10
item.description: Neighbors Blvd. south at I-10. BL-10 ends here and CA-78 begins.

item.title: End I-10 Business at I-10 and CA-78
item.description: Western end of I-10 Blythe business loop at I-10 on Neighbors Blvd. Neighbors Blvd. continues south as CA-78.

item.title: I-10 West Exit 236 Offramp at CA-78
item.description: I-10 west Exit 236 offramp at CA-78. CA-78 heads southwest to the Imperial Valley and eventually Oceanside. This is also the western end of the Blythe I-10 Business Loop.

item.title: I-10 West Exit 236 Offramp at CA-78
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 236 at CA-78 to Palo Verde and Ripley.

item.title: I-10 Exit 1 Onramp
item.description: I-10 west onramp to Los Angeles at Exit 1.

item.title: BL-10 West Approaching US-95/AZ-95
item.description: BL-10 west approaching US-95 south to Yuma, and AZ-95 north to Parker.

item.title: BL-10 West at Main St. - Quartzsite
item.description: BL-10 west at Main St. in Quartzsite. Turn left on Main St. for US-95, AZ-95 to Yuma and Parker. Turn left to continue on BL-10.

item.title: End US-60 West at I-10
item.description: End US-60 west at I-10 Exit 31 onramp.

item.title: End US-60 West at I-10
item.description: Western end of US-60 at I-10. The eastern end of US-60 is in Virginia Beach, Virginia.

item.title: End US-60 Approaching I-10
item.description: End US-60 approaching I-10. Use I-10 west for Los Angeles, and I-10 east for Phoenix.

item.title: US-60 West at AZ-72 West
item.description: US-60 west at AZ-72 west. AZ-72 runs northwest to Parker.

item.title: US-60 West at AZ-72
item.description: US-60 west at AZ-72. Use AZ-72 east for Parker. Continue west on US-60 for Blythe (CA).

item.title: US-60 West Approaching AZ-72
item.description: US-60 west approaching AZ-72. Approaching the community of Hope, AZ.

item.description: US-60 west at AZ-71

item.title: US-60 West Approaching AZ-71
item.description: US-60 west approaching AZ-71. Use AZ-71 north for Prescott. Continue west on US-60 for Los Angeles.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching AZ-71
item.description: US-60 west approaching AZ-71.

item.title: US-60 West at Old US-93
item.description: US-60 west at former terminus of US-93, now signed as To US-93/To AZ-89. The main US-93/US-60 intersection was moved a half mile to the east and turned into a roundabout in 2009.

item.title: US-60 West at US-93
item.description: US-60 west at US-93 roundabout. This is the southern terminus of US-93.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching US-93
item.description: US-60 west approaching US-93 at roundabout. This is a new alignment for US-60 and US-93, which moves a major intersection from the downtown area of Wickenburg

item.description: US-60 west approaching US-93 North/To AZ-89

item.description: US-60 west approaching US-93, (To) AZ-89.

item.description: US-60 west at AZ-74 East/To I-17. Use AZ-74 east to connect to I-17 at the north edge of the Phoenix Metro. area.

item.title: AZ-303 Loop North at US-60
item.description: AZ-303 Loop North offramp at US-60/Grand Ave. Use US-60 west for Wickenburg.

item.title: Olive Ave. Approaching AZ-303 Loop
item.description: Olive Ave. east approaching AZ-303 Loop.

item.title: I-10 Exit 124 Offramp at AZ-303 Loop
item.description: I-10 Exit 123 offramp at AZ-303 Loop. AZ-303 Loop is signed as To AZ-303 Loop until it leaves Cotton Lane.

item.title: I-10 West at Exit 133B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 133B - AZ-101 Loop North. This is the western end of the AZ-101 Loop. I-10 continues west to Los Angeles.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 136A
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 136A - 79th Ave. This is a HOV interchange.

item.description: I-10 west at Exit 141 - 34th Ave

item.description: US-60 west at Exit 179 - AZ-87/Country Club Drive/Chandler

item.title: Mesa Drive North at US-60
item.description: Mesa Drive north at US-60. Use US-60 west for Phoenix. Use US-60 east for Globe.

item.title: US-60 West at AZ-177 South
item.description: US-60 west at AZ-177 south to Winkelman and Kearny. AZ-177 is not displayed as a typical highway shield here, instead it is written out in text.

item.title: US-70 West/AZ-77 North at US-60/AZ-77
item.description: US-70 west at US-60/AZ-77 junction. Use US-60 East/AZ-77 North for Show Low and Springerville. Use US-60 west for Globe and Phoenix. This is the western end of US-70.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching US-60
item.description: US-70 west approaching US-60. AZ-77 north has been following US-70 west, and turns onto US-60 east. This is the western terminus of US-70.

item.title: US-70 West at AZ-77
item.description: US-70 west at AZ-77. Use AZ-77 south for Winkelman and Tucson. Continue west on US-70/AZ-77 north for Globe.

item.title: US-70 West at US-191 South
item.description: US-70 west at US-191 south. Use US-70 west for Globe and Phoenix. Use US-70 East/US-191 North for Lordsburg (NM).

item.title: US-70 West at US-191 South
item.description: US-70 west at US-191 south. Use US-70 west for Globe and Phoenix. Use US-191 South for Willcox.

item.title: US-191 South Approaching US-70
item.description: US-191 south approaching US-70. Use US-70 West/US-191 South for Safford and Phoenix. Use US-70 east for Lordsburg (NM).

item.title: US-191 South Approaching US-70
item.description: US-191 south approaching US-70.

item.title: End AZ-78 West at US-191/AZ-75
item.description: End AZ-78 west at US-191/AZ-75. Use US-191 north for Clifton. Use US-191 south for Safford. Use AZ-75 south for Duncan.

item.description: AZ-78 west approaching US-191 and AZ-75.

item.title: End NM-78 East at US-180
item.description: End NM-78 east at US-180. Use US-180 west for Glenwood. Use US-180 east for Silver City.

item.title: US-180 West Approaching NM-78
item.description: US-180 west approaching NM-78. Use NM-78 west for Clifton, AZ, Safford, AZ, and Mule Creek.

item.title: US-180 West at NM-211
item.description: US-180 west at NM-211 to Gila.

item.title: US-180 West Approaching NM-211
item.description: US-180 west approaching NM-211 to Gila. US-180 continues west to Cliff.

item.title: US-70 West/NM-90 East at Split
item.description: US-70 West/NM-90 East at US-70/NM-90 split. Use US-70 west for Duncan(AZ) and Globe(AZ). Use NM-90 for Silver City.

item.title: US-70 West/NM-90 East Approaching Split
item.description: US-70 West/NM-East approaching US-70/NM-90 Split.

item.title: BL-10 East at US-70/NM-90
item.description: BL-10 east at US-70/NM-90 to Duncan (AZ) and Silver City.

item.title: BL-10 West at I-10 East to Deming
item.description: BL-10 west at I-10 east to Deming.

item.title: Rest Area Access Road at BL-10
item.description: New Mexico Rest Area access road at BL-10. Turn right for I-10 East to Deming. Turn left for BL-10 east into Lordsburg.

item.title: BL-10 West at I-10
item.description: BL-10 west at I-10 West. Head over the overpass for I-10 east.

item.title: BL-10 West Approaching I-10
item.description: BL-10 west approaching I-10. Use I-10 west for Tucson. Use I-10 east for Deming.

item.title: NM-494 North at BL-10/US-70/NM-90
item.description: NM-494 north at BL-10/US-70 and NM-90.

item.title: NM-338 North at I-10 Onramp
item.description: NM-338 north at I-10. Use I-10 west for Road Forks. Use I-10 east for Lordsburg.

item.title: I-10 East at Exit 3 Offramp
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 3 offramp. Turn left for Steins. Continue ahead for I-10 east to Lordsburg.

item.title: Ina Road West Approaching I-10
item.description: Ina Road west approaching I-10.

item.title: BL-8 west at I-8 West Onramp
item.description: BL-8 west at I-8 west onramp at Exit 119. Use I-8 west for San Diego. BL-8 west continues into Gila Bend.

item.title: AZ-280 North at I-8
item.description: AZ-280 north at I-8. Use I-8 west for San Diego. Use I-8 east for Phoenix and Tucson.

item.title: CA-78 East/CA-111 South at Split
item.description: CA-78 East/CA-111 South at Split. Use CA-111 south for Calexico. Use CA-78 east for Holtville.

item.title: CA-78 East/CA-111 South Approaching Split
item.description: CA-78 East/CA-111 South approaching split. Turn right for CA-111 south.

item.title: CA-78 East/CA-86 South at Split
item.description: CA-78 East/CA-86 South at Split. Turn right for CA-86 south to El Centro. Continue east on CA-78 for Blythe.

item.title: CA-78 East/CA-86 South Approaching Split
item.description: CA-78 East/CA-86 South approaching CA-78/CA-86 split. Use CA-78 east for Blythe. Use CA-86 south for El Centro.

item.title: CA-86S Approaching CA-111
item.description: CA-86S approaching CA-111 South to Niland and Calipatria.

item.title: CA-86S South Approaching CA-195 To CA-111
item.description: CA-86S South approaching CA-195 to CA-111 South.
